name: SpaceKitten Invasion
description:
Created for the Epic Mega Jam 2019
A SpaceKitten Invasion is about to happen. You are responsible for everyone on Earth. You have to strategically place buildings and plan your spaceship orbits to defend the planet from Alien SpaceKittens.

Features 

- build structures to defend the planet

- plan the orbiting paths for spaceships

... No... just kidding. The game is unbalanced and there are some bugs as I ran out of time.
